info.title: ZEDEDA Edge-Node Cluster Service
info.description: The service defines the APIs to work with edge-node clusters. The APIs include such operations as creating, updating, and deleting edge-node clusters, as well as listing and getting details of edge-node clusters.

400.description: Bad Request. The API gateway did not process the request because of missing parameter or invalid value of parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. The API gateway did not process the request because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource. The request header has either no authorization details or an authorization that has been refused.

403.description: Forbidden. The API gateway did not process the request because the requestor does not have application level access permission for the operation or does not have access scope to the project.

404.description: Not Found. The API gateway did not process the request because the requested resource could not be found.

409.description: Conflict. The API gateway did not process the request because this edge-node cluster record will conflict with an already existing edge-node cluster record.

412.description: Precondition failed. Some of preconditions haven't been met to start request processing.

500.description: Internal Server Error. The API gateway experienced an unexpected condition. Specific error condition is indicated in error codes.

504.description: Gateway Timeout. The API gateway did not receive a timely response from an upstream microservice it needed to communicate with in order to complete the request.

parameters.name: filter.projectName
parameters.description: User defined name of the project, unique across the enterprise. Once project is created, name can’t be changed

parameters.name: filter.projectNamePattern
parameters.description: cluster project name pattern

parameters.name: filter.namePattern
parameters.description: cluster name pattern

parameters.name: filter.includeZks
parameters.description: include zks clusters

parameters.description: Page Token

parameters.description: OrderBy helps in sorting the list response

parameters.description: Page Number

parameters.description: Defines the page size

parameters.description: Total number of pages to be fetched.

AdminState.description:
- ADMIN_STATE_CREATED: Entity Created in the controller
 - ADMIN_STATE_DELETED: Entity Deleted in the controller
 - ADMIN_STATE_ACTIVE: Entity Activated in the controller
 - ADMIN_STATE_INACTIVE: Entity Deactivated in the controller
 - ADMIN_STATE_REGISTERED: Specific to Edge-node - Edge-node Registered with the controller
 - ADMIN_STATE_ARCHIVED: Entity Archived in the controller
AdminState.title: AdminState - On update, please update AdminState_HttpRequest as well

uuid.description: system generated unique id for an image

imvolId.description: immutable Volume for this base image

orderBy.description: OrderBy helps in sorting the list response

totalPages.description: Total number of pages to be fetched.

Cursor.description: Cursor helps in filtering the various list response like edge-app bundle list, model list, bundle list etc.
Cursor.title: Cursor is used as filter in list operation.

id.description: System defined universally unique Id of the cluster

name.description: User defined name of the cluster, unique across the enterprise. Once cluster is created, name can’t be changed

title.description: User defined title of the cluster. Title can be changed at any time

tags.description: Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Tag names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Tag values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3.

nodes.description: A list of nodes in the cluster

id.description: System defined universally unique Id of the cluster

name.description: User defined name of the cluster, unique across the enterprise. Once cluster is created, name can’t be changed

title.description: User defined title of the cluster. Title can be changed at any time

tags.description: Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Tag names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Tag values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3.

nodes.description: A list of nodes in the cluster

updatedAt.description: Last updated time of the cluster

projectName.description: User defined name of the project, unique across the enterprise. Once project is created, name can’t be changed

id.description: System defined universally unique Id of the node

clusterInterface.description: User defined name of the cluster interface, unique across the enterprise. Once cluster interface is created, name can’t be changed

resourceLabels.description: Resource labels are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Label names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Label values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3.

EdgeNodeClusterType.description:
- EDGE_NODE_CLUSTER_TYPE_STANDART: A standard cluster is a cluster that has exactly 3 nodes.
This is the default type, which does not support zks clusters.
 - EDGE_NODE_CLUSTER_TYPE_ZKS: A zks cluster is a cluster that can have 1, 3 or more nodes.
Its role is to support zks clusters.

RunState.description:
- RUN_STATE_ONLINE: Entity Online
 - RUN_STATE_HALTED: Entity Halted
 - RUN_STATE_INIT: Entity Initializing
 - RUN_STATE_REBOOTING: Entity Rebooting
 - RUN_STATE_OFFLINE: Entity Offline
 - RUN_STATE_UNKNOWN: Entity state Unknown
 - RUN_STATE_UNPROVISIONED: Entity Unprovisioned
 - RUN_STATE_PROVISIONED: Entity Provisioned
 - RUN_STATE_SUSPECT: Entity Suspect
 - RUN_STATE_DOWNLOADING: Edge-node downloading entity artifacts
 - RUN_STATE_RESTARTING: Entity Restarting
 - RUN_STATE_PURGING: Entity Purging
 - RUN_STATE_HALTING: Entity Halting
 - RUN_STATE_ERROR: Entity encountered an error
 - RUN_STATE_VERIFYING: Verification of downloaded Artifacts in Progress.
 - RUN_STATE_LOADING: Loading of Artifacts into local datastore in Progress.
 - RUN_STATE_CREATING_VOLUME: Volume creation from artifacts in Progress
 - RUN_STATE_BOOTING: Entity booting up
 - RUN_STATE_MAINTENANCE_MODE: Entity maintenance mode
 - RUN_STATE_START_DELAYED: Application start delayed as per configuration
 - RUN_STATE_BASEOS_UPDATING: Device BaseOs Update in Progress
 - RUN_STATE_PREPARING_POWEROFF: device preparing power off - shutting down all app instances
 - RUN_STATE_POWERING_OFF: device powering off from local profile server
 - RUN_STATE_PREPARED_POWEROFF: device prepared power off - all app instances are shut down
RunState.title: RunState - On update, please update RunState_HttpRequest as well

ZcOpsStatus.description:
- OPS_STATUS_PENDING: In rare cases, system may not start operation when it was requested. Client will be notified that operation is PENDING
 - OPS_STATUS_ONGOING: system will start the operation, but at the time response was generated, operation is still ONGOING.
 - OPS_STATUS_COMPLETE: Even if the result of the operations may result in failure, but the OpsStatus will marked COMPLETE for almost all cases.
ZcOpsStatus.title: ZedCloud internal operation status

ec.title:
Enumrated error code, describes more granular numerical
value than just httpStatus

details.title: Field captures string description of details

ZsrvErrorCode.description:
- zMsgErrorNone: common validation errors
 - IncompleteData: message had fields that weren't filled in
 - InvalidData: message contained the field that wasn't expected
 - FunctionUnsupported: this feature unavailable on this version of device
 - InvalidFieldFormat: message contained the field that wasn't correctly formatted
 - JsonFmtError: Marshal / Unmarshal errors
 - DataBaseConnection: generic DB error
ZsrvErrorCode.title: ZedCould internal error code

operationType.title:
Describes one of the operations type : possible values
                        Read/Delete/Create/Update/List

operationStatus.title: if this is log running job

objectKind.title: zedcloud object kind on which the operation was performed

objectId.title: Unique value identifies the object that was operated on

objectRevision.title:
object revision post the operation, note Read operation
doesn't change the revision

user.title: the operation is performed on behalf of this user

httpStatusMsg.title: summary of the error in text format

error.title:
one or more errors will be set if the operation failed
i.e. httpStatusCode != 2xx

eveinfoDeviceEntity.title: DeviceEntity contains the device entity details

eveinfoEntity.description:
- ENTITY_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid Device Entity
 - ENTITY_BASE_OS: Base OS entity
 - ENTITY_SYSTEM_ADAPTER: System Adapter Entity
 - ENTITY_VAULT: Vault Entity
 - ENTITY_ATTESTATION: Attestation Entity
 - ENTITY_APP_INSTANCE: App Instance Entity
 - ENTITY_PORT: Port Entity
 - ENTITY_NETWORK: Network Entity
 - ENTITY_NETWORK_INSTANCE: Network Instance Entity
 - ENTITY_CONTENT_TREE: ContentTree Entity
 - ENTITY_CONTENT_BLOB: Blob Entity
 - ENTITY_VOLUME: VOLUME Entity
eveinfoEntity.title: Entity contains the entity type

infoErrorInfo.title: Errors in response to the application of configuration

infoKubeComp.description:
KubeComp is a component installed in eve after usb install.
 These are provided to show more detail on cluster update progress.

infoKubeCompUpdateStatus.description:
KubeCompUpdateStatus will track status of each
 KubeComp which will update serially in a cluster.

ipAddress.title: IP address of the application, on cni0 interface

nodeName.title: Node name on which the application is running

lastTransitionTime.title: last_transition_time is the last time the Condition changed

infoKubeNodeConditionType.title:
KubeNodeStatus follows Kubernetes Node Conditions
  Refer here: https://pkg.go.dev/k8s.io/api/core/v1#NodeConditionType

name.title: Name of the node, will match device name

roleServer.title: Role of the node is server or not

creationTimestamp.title: Creation Time of the node in the cluster

apiServerSersion.title: Version of the API Server running on the node

internalIp.title: Internal IP address of the node

admissionStatus.title: Admission State of the local node in a cluster

nodeId.title: Id of the eve node matching config.EdgeDevConfig.id

podCount.title: Number of pods in the namespace

podRunningCount.title: Number of pods in the namespace that are running

podPendingCount.title: Number of pods in the namespace that are pending

podFailedCount.title: Number of pods in the namespace that are failed

podSucceededCount.title: Number of pods in the namespace that are succeeded

infoKubePodStatus.title:
KubePodStatus is a combination of the kubernetes status:
 PodPhase: https://pkg.go.dev/k8s.io/api/core/v1#PodPhase
 PodConditionType: https://pkg.go.dev/k8s.io/api/core/v1#PodConditionType
 ContainerState: https://pkg.go.dev/k8s.io/api/core/v1#ContainerState

health.title: Health of the distributes storage services

transitionTime.title: Time of the most recent health status transition

volumes.title: Status of all the volumes in Longhorn

lastTransitionTime.title: LastTransitionTime is the last time is_ready changed

isReady.title: IsReady is true if the VMI has a Ready Condition which is true

nodeName.title: NodeName is the current node (kubernetes.io/hostname) the VMI is running on

infoKubeVMIInfo.title: KubeVMIInfo is the VMI status of eve VM apps

infoKubeVMIStatus.title:
KubeVMIStatus is the VirtualMachineInstancePhase
Refer to: https://pkg.go.dev/kubevirt.io/api/core/v1#VirtualMachineInstancePhase

creationTimestamp.title: Creation Time of the volume in the cluster

provisionedBytes.title: Provisioned size of the volume in bytes

allocatedBytes.title: Allocated size of the volume in bytes

robustnessSubstate.title: Robustness substate of the replication status of the volume

volumeId.title: Id of the eve volume info.ZInfoVolume.uuid

ownerNode.title: Node replica resides on, will match node name

rebuildProgressPercentage.title: Rebuild progress of the volume replica

infoNodeAdmission.description:
- NODE_ADMISSION_NOT_CLUSTERED: Not Clustered is the default state at first boot
 - NODE_ADMISSION_LEAVING: Leaving can be a long lived state due to draining existing data
 - NODE_ADMISSION_JOINING: Joining can be a long lived state if inter-node networking is not operable
 - NODE_ADMISSION_JOINED: Joined is reached when the node becomes Ready the first time after a request
to join the cluster
infoNodeAdmission.title: Cluster Admission status of the eve node

infoServiceStatus.title:
ServiceStatus denotes a cluster wide
 infrastructure component's health.
 eg. a daemonset which requires pods on multiple nodes

infoStorageHealthStatus.description:
StorageHealthStatus is a higher level tracking status to show redundancy/failure-zone level
and rebuild progress.

infoStorageVolumePVCStatus.title:
StorageVolumePVCStatus is the kubernetes 'phase' of a PVC. Listed as status in cli.
 Refer to: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes#phase

infoStorageVolumeReplicaStatus.description:
StorageVolumeReplicaStatus is a higher level status which combines replica and engine
   status to show a simplified view of a replica rebuild state.

infoStorageVolumeRobustness.title:
StorageVolumeRobustness is the 'robustness' of a replicated csi-driver volume.
 Refer to: https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn-manager/blob/v1.6.2/k8s/pkg/apis/longhorn/v1beta1/volume.go#L25

infoStorageVolumeState.title:
StorageVolumeState is the kubernetes 'state' field of a replicated csi-driver volume.
 Refer to: https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn-manager/blob/v1.6.2/k8s/pkg/apis/longhorn/v1beta1/volume.go#L14

nodes.title: Info message on a list of cluster nodes

podNameSpaces.title: Info message on a list of namespaces's pods summary

eveApps.title: Info message on a list of EVE applications

clusterId.description:
Cluster UUID which will match config.EdgeNodeCluster.cluster_id passed
  in to the node by the controller.

eveVmApps.title: Virtual Machines running on the cluster

currentNode.title: current_node will have an empty value when no node is in an update

component.title: component currently under update or KUBE_COMP_UNSPECIFIED when no update in progress

status.title:
status of the current component under update, KUBE_COMP_UPDATE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED when
  no updates in progress

error.title: Error info in case of failure

clusterId.description:
Cluster UUID which will match config.EdgeNodeCluster.cluster_id passed
  in to the node by the controller.
